name: Order of Shadows
description: A secret order of knights who fight dark forces
lore: Founded during the Great War of Darkness, the Order of Shadows protects the realms from demons.

name: Guardians of the Void
description: Knights who have embraced the power of the void
lore: Those who gazed into the abyss and emerged transformed.

name: Knights of Blood
description: A cursed order that feeds on battles
lore: Cursed by an ancient pact, these knights are immortal but thirst for blood.
